title: Check if Even

explanation.approach: Last bit is 0 for even numbers.
explanation.analogy: In binary, even numbers always end in 0.

title: Check if Odd

explanation.approach: Last bit is 1 for odd numbers.
explanation.analogy: In binary, odd numbers end in 1.

title: Count Set Bits

explanation.approach: Check last bit, shift right, repeat.

title: Check Power of 2

explanation.approach: Power of 2 has exactly one 1 bit.
steps: If result is 0, only one bit was set

title: Toggle Kth Bit

explanation.approach: XOR with 1 at position k flips that bit.

title: Set Kth Bit

explanation.approach: OR with 1 at position k sets that bit.

title: Clear Kth Bit

explanation.approach: AND with inverted mask clears that bit.

title: Check Kth Bit

explanation.approach: Shift right k positions, check last bit.

title: Swap Two Numbers

explanation.analogy: Magic math swap without extra variable!
steps: b = a XOR b (now b = original a)

title: Find Single Number

explanation.approach: XOR all: pairs cancel, single remains.
explanation.analogy: a^a=0, so duplicates vanish, unique stays.

title: Rightmost Set Bit

explanation.approach: Shift right until last bit is 1.
explanation.analogy: 12=1100, first 1 from right is at position 2
